Trade/Device Name(s): Joinsoon® EON L Glucose Monitoring System
Joinsoon® EON LS Glucose Monitoring System
Joinsoon® EON L Blood Glucose Meter
Joinsoon® EON LS Blood Glucose Meter
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Joinsoon® EON L Blood Glucose Meter
Joinsoon® EON LS Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Joinsoon® EON L and EON LS Glucose Monitoring Systems for self-testing blood glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor meters and strips.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips for self-testing by people with diabetes in a home setting; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
